header-overseas: We will call you to confirm details

addtional.p: Your State Pension application has been sent and you donâ€™t need to do anything else.

p1.default: You will receive details about your State Pension up to 14 days before your State Pension date. We may also contact you if we need more information.

start-date-from.less-than-9-weeks: We'll call you to confirm some of the details you've given us before we process your application.
start-date-from.more-than-9-weeks: You will either receive details about your State Pension or we will contact you to provide further information.

p1.overseas: We will call you within the next 4 weeks to confirm some of the details you've given us before we process your application.

p2: You must report the following changes straight away:
p2-l1: change of address (including going into hospital, a care home or permanently leaving the UK)
p2-l3: death of a spouse or civil partner

overseas.p2-l3: death of a spouse or civil partner
overseas.p2-l4: divorce from a spouse or civil partner

feedback-link-text: What did you think of this service?
